CustomField.description: This field is updated by a Process Builder record from the 'Inquiry Control' object. This field is also read by the 'Inquiry Assignment' object, this controls the allocation and cadence of new Inquiry allocation per agent. If 'Receiving Inquiries' is FALSE this will remove the user from the Inquiry distribution automation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Agent controls if they are receiving new inquiry records via the 'Inquiry Control' record (Turned On or Off)
CustomField.label: Receiving Inquiries
